definitions.body: in Galilee Jos 20:7, Jos 21:32 (P), 1Ch 6:61; Naphtali Jos 19:37 (P), [[נַפְתָּלִי]] ´[[ק]]: Ju Jdg 4:6; = [[קֶדֶשׁ]] alone Jos 12:22 (D; with king); Ju Jdg 4:9, Jdg 4:10 + v:Jdg 4:11 (where poss. different place on sea of Galilee, v. GFM:Ju 117, 119), also 2Ki 15:29; TelAm. Kidši; Eg. Ḳdšë WMM:As. u. Eur. 173, 217; mod. Kades, NW. of Lake Huleh; v. Rob:BR iii. 366 ff. Survey:WP i. 226 ff. Buhl:Geogr. 235 f.
Kedev: city of refuge in Issachar 1Ch 6:57 = [[קִשְׁיוֹן]] Jos 21:28; poss. Tel Abu Kudeis [Survey:WP i. 69], c. 2 miles SE. from Lejjun (Megiddo): cf. Buhl:Geogr. 209.
Kadhv: in S. Judah; Ho 15:23 (P) (= II. [[קָדֵשׁ]]
? if so, then Mass. distinction from [[קֶדֶשׁ]] in N. was here neglected).
